<Setter Property="Foreground" Value="##219653" /> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="1" /> <Setter Property="BorderBrush" Value="##219653" /> <Setter Property="Cursor" Value="Hand" /> FontSize="16" FontFamily="Roboto" HorizontalContentAlignment="Left" Grid.Row="0" /> <TextBlock Text="Доцент кафедры микробиолгоии" Style="{StaticResource TextBlock}" Grid.Row="1" /> <Button Content="ИЗМЕНИТЬ" Style="{StaticResource BlueBtn}" Grid.Row="2" /> <Button Content="ВЫХОД" Style="{StaticResource RedBtn}" Grid.Row="3" /> </Grid> </StackPanel> </Border> <Button Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="3" Style="{StaticResource GreenBtn}" Content="Запустить VR" />.../>
